root: ^Twinkle: Hi, doc. I know it's been a while since I've come by. I've been doing a lot of thinking. About YPZ. About this disease, about how long we've been fighting, and about how we could get ourselves a chance.

Chance: ^Twinkle: We can't just be silent and disconnected anymore. We're all wildly different, but we're all stuck in this death spiral together. Can't be crabs in a bucket, our only escape is connection.
ComeDown: ^Twinkle enters the room with a fire lit behind their eyes, they're more determined than ever.
